name: Dice Dash Arena
description:
Dice Dash Arena was created for the GMTKJam in July 2022, which had the theme of 'Roll of the Dice'.

How to play:

Your aim is to earn points by defeating the enemy (pink) dice by dashing into them, while avoiding getting hit by bullets, enemy dice, or falling off the play area.

Arrow keys - Move
Z - Charge up dash

When your dash is fully charged (your outline flashes orange), tap a direction (while still holding Z) to boost in that direction! You are invulnerable to pits, bullets, and enemy dice while you are dashing.

Standard controllers are supported, too (on an XBOX controller, the buttons are A to charge, B to start game).

Credits:

Soundole (Peter Anthony Smith) - Design, Programming, Audio Design, Graphics
Connor Grail (https://cgrail.itch.io/) - Music, Playtesting
Bookwyrmle (Erin Harrison) - Stoically looking after our son so that I had a chance to finish making this!
